personal_info.name: geetha
personal_info.bio: Hello! I am Geetha, a motivated Computer Science Engineering student with a passion for exploring various technologies.

certifications.title: HTML
certifications.description: Certified in static website development, responsive web design with Bootstrap and Flexbox.

certifications.title: Python Programming, Machine Learning
certifications.description: Certified in Python programming, focusing on foundational and advanced programming concepts with machine learning algorithms.

certifications.title: Dynamic Website Design with JavaScript
certifications.description: Certified in designing dynamic websites using JavaScript.

achievements.title: Sports
achievements.description: Honored for accomplishments in inter and intra-school badminton, kho-kho, and Bhagavad Gita chanting competitions.

achievements.title: Hindi Proficiency
achievements.description: Completed Hindi exams up to Madhyama level with Dakshina Bharat Hindi Prachar Sabha.

projects.title: Password Strength Checker

projects.title: Sonar-Based Mineral Detection
projects.description: Developed a sonar-based system for mineral and rock detection, optimizing exploration processes using Machine Learning.

projects.title: Mini Voting System
